Control Header.description: SFZ v2 header which should come before global in the file. Delete unneeded opcodes.

Global Header.description: SFZ v2 header which allows entering parameters common to all regions in the SFZ file.

Master Header.description: ARIA header between global and group.

Group Header.description: SFZ v1 header which allows entering common parameters for multiple regions.

Region Header.description: SFZ v1 header where parameters are entered.

Curve Header.description: SFZ v2 header for defining curves for MIDI CC controls.

SFZv1 amp_keycenter.description: Center key for amplifier keyboard tracking. In this key, the amplifier keyboard tracking will have no effect. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv1 amp_keytrack.description: Amplifier keyboard tracking (change in amplitude per key) in decibels. Type: float | Range: -96 to 12 dB

SFZv1 amp_random.description: Random volume for the region, in decibels. Type: float | Range: 0 to 24 dB

SFZv1 amp_velcurve_N.description: User-defined amplifier velocity curve. Type: float | Range: 0 to 1

SFZv1 amp_veltrack.description: Amplifier velocity tracking, represents how much the amplitude changes with incoming note velocity. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100 %

SFZv1 ampeg_attack.description: EG attack time. Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 ampeg_decay.description: EG decay time. Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 ampeg_delay.description: EG delay time. Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 ampeg_hold.description: EG hold time. Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 ampeg_release.description: EG release time (after note release). Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 ampeg_start.description: Envelope start level, in percentage. Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 %

SFZv1 ampeg_sustain.description: EG sustain level, in percentage. Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 %

SFZv1 ampeg_vel2attack.description: Velocity effect on EG attack time. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 ampeg_vel2decay.description: Velocity effect on EG decay time. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 ampeg_vel2delay.description: Velocity effect on EG delay time. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 ampeg_vel2hold.description: Velocity effect on EG hold time. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 ampeg_vel2release.description: Velocity effect on EG release time. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 ampeg_vel2sustain.description: Velocity effect on EG sustain level, in percentage. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100 %

SFZv1 amplfo_delay.description: The time before the LFO starts oscillating. Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 amplfo_depth.description: LFO depth. Type: float | Range: -10 to 10 dB

SFZv1 amplfo_depthchanaft.description: LFO depth when channel aftertouch MIDI messages are received. Type: float | Range: -10 to 10 dB

SFZv1 amplfo_depthpolyaft.description: LFO depth when polyphonic aftertouch MIDI messages are received. Type: float | Range: -10 to 10 dB

SFZv1 amplfo_fade.description: LFO fade-in effect time. Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 amplfo_freq.description: LFO frequency, in hertz. Type: float | Range: 0 to 20 Hz

SFZv1 amplfo_freqchanaft.description: LFO frequency change when channel aftertouch MIDI messages are received, in Hertz. Type: float | Range: -200 to 200 Hz

SFZv1 amplfo_freqpolyaft.description: LFO frequency change when polyphonic aftertouch MIDI messages are received, in Hertz. Type: float | Range: -200 to 200 Hz

SFZv1 bend_down.description: Pitch bend range when Bend Wheel or Joystick is moved down, in cents. Type: integer | Range: -9600 to 9600 cents

SFZv1 bend_step.description: Pitch bend step, in cents. Type: integer | Range: 1 to 1200 cents

SFZv1 bend_up.description: Pitch bend range when Bend Wheel or Joystick is moved up, in cents. Type: integer | Range: -9600 to 9600 cents

SFZv1 benddown.description: bend_down alias. Type: integer | Range: -9600 to 9600 cents

SFZv1 bendstep.description: bend_step alias. Type: integer | Range: 1 to 1200 cents

SFZv1 bendup.description: bend_up alias. Type: integer | Range: -9600 to 9600 cents

SFZv1 count.description: The number of times the sample will be played. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 4294967296

SFZv1 cutoff_ccN.description: The variation in the cutoff frequency when MIDI continuous controller N is received. Type: integer | Range: -9600 to 9600 cents

SFZv1 cutoff_chanaft.description: The variation in the cutoff frequency when MIDI channel aftertouch messages are received, in cents. Type: integer | Range: -9600 to 9600 cents

SFZv1 cutoff_polyaft.description: The variation in the cutoff frequency when MIDI polyphonic aftertouch messages are received, in cents. Type: integer | Range: -9600 to 9600 cents

SFZv1 cutoff.description: Sets the cutoff frequency (Hz) of the filters. Type: float | Range: 0 to SampleRate / 2 Hz

SFZv1 delay_ccN.description: Region delay time after MIDI continuous controller N messages are received. If the region receives a note-off message before delay time, the region won't play. Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 delay_random.description: Region random delay time. Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 delay.description: Region delay time. Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 effect1.description: Level of effect1 send, in percentage (reverb in Cakewalk sfz). Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 %

SFZv1 effect2.description: Level of effect2 send, in percentage (chorus in Cakewalk sfz). Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 %

SFZv1 end.description: The endpoint of the sample. If unspecified, the entire sample will play. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 4294967296 sample units

SFZv1 eqN_bw.description: Bandwidth of the equalizer band, in octaves. Type: float | Range: 0.001 to 4 octaves

SFZv1 eqN_freq.description: Frequency of the equalizer band, in Hertz. Type: float | Range: 0 to 30000 Hz

SFZv1 eqN_gain.description: Gain of the equalizer band, in decibels. Type: float | Range: -96 to 24 dB

SFZv1 eqN_vel2freq.description: Frequency change of the equalizer band with MIDI velocity, in Hertz. Type: float | Range: -30000 to 30000 Hz

SFZv1 eqN_vel2gain.description: Gain change of the equalizer band with MIDI velocity, in decibels. Type: float | Range: -96 to 24 dB

SFZv1 fil_keycenter.description: Center key for filter keyboard tracking. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv1 fil_keytrack.description: Filter keyboard tracking (change on cutoff for each key) in cents. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 1200 cents

SFZv1 fil_random.description: Random value added to the filter cutoff for the region, in cents. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 9600 cents

SFZv1 fil_type.description: Filter type. Type: string | Range: lpf_1p, hpf_1p, lpf_2p, hpf_2p, bpf_2p, brf_2p, bpf_1p, brf_1p, apf_1p, lpf_2p_sv, hpf_2p_sv, bpf_2p_sv, brf_2p_sv, pkf_2p, lpf_4p, hpf_4p, lpf_6p, hpf_6p, comb, pink, lsh, hsh, peq

SFZv1 fil_veltrack.description: Filter velocity tracking, the amount by which the cutoff changes with incoming note velocity, in cents. Type: integer | Range: -9600 to 9600 cents

SFZv1 fileg_attack.description: EG attack time. Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 fileg_decay.description: EG decay time. Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 fileg_delay.description: EG delay time. Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 fileg_depth.description: Envelope depth. Type: integer | Range: -12000 to 12000 cents

SFZv1 fileg_hold.description: EG hold time. Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 fileg_release.description: EG release time (after note release). Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 fileg_start.description: Envelope start level, in percentage. Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 %

SFZv1 fileg_sustain.description: EG sustain level, in percentage. Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 %

SFZv1 fileg_vel2attack.description: Velocity effect on EG attack time. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 fileg_vel2decay.description: Velocity effect on filter EG decay time. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 fileg_vel2delay.description: Velocity effect on filter EG delay time. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 fileg_vel2depth.description: Velocity effect on EG depth, in cents for pitch or filter cutoff. Type: integer | Range: -12000 to 12000 cents

SFZv1 fileg_vel2hold.description: Velocity effect on EG hold time. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 fileg_vel2release.description: Velocity effect on EG release time. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 fileg_vel2sustain.description: Velocity effect on EG sustain level, in percentage. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100 %

SFZv1 fillfo_delay.description: The time before the LFO starts oscillating. Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 fillfo_depth.description: LFO depth. Type: float | Range: -1200 to 1200 cents

SFZv1 fillfo_depthchanaft.description: LFO depth when channel aftertouch MIDI messages are received. Type: float | Range: -1200 to 1200 cents

SFZv1 fillfo_depthpolyaft.description: LFO depth when polyphonic aftertouch MIDI messages are received. Type: float | Range: -1200 to 1200 cents

SFZv1 fillfo_fade.description: LFO fade-in effect time. Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 fillfo_freq.description: LFO frequency, in hertz. Type: float | Range: 0 to 20 Hz

SFZv1 fillfo_freqchanaft.description: LFO frequency change when channel aftertouch MIDI messages are received, in Hertz. Type: float | Range: -200 to 200 Hz

SFZv1 fillfo_freqpolyaft.description: LFO frequency change when polyphonic aftertouch MIDI messages are received, in Hertz. Type: float | Range: -200 to 200 Hz

SFZv1 filtype.description: fil_type alias. Type: string | Range: lpf_1p, hpf_1p, lpf_2p, hpf_2p, bpf_2p, brf_2p, bpf_1p, brf_1p, apf_1p, lpf_2p_sv, hpf_2p_sv, bpf_2p_sv, brf_2p_sv, pkf_2p, lpf_4p, hpf_4p, lpf_6p, hpf_6p, comb, pink, lsh, hsh, peq

SFZv1 gain_ccN.description: Gain applied on MIDI control N, in decibels. Type: float | Range: -144 to 48 dB

SFZv1 group.description: Exclusive group number for this region. Type: integer | Range: -2147483648 to 2147483647

SFZv1 hibend.description: Defines the range of the last Pitch Bend message required for the region to play. Type: integer | Range: -8192 to 8192

SFZv1 hibpm.description: Host tempo value. Type: float | Range: 0 to 500 bpm

SFZv1 hiccN.description: Defines the range of the last MIDI controller N required for the region to play. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv1 hichan.description: If incoming notes have a MIDI channel between lochan and hichan, the region will play. Type: integer | Range: 1 to 16

SFZv1 hichanaft.description: Defines the range of last Channel Aftertouch message required for the region to play. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv1 hikey.description: Determine the high boundary of a certain region. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv1 hipolyaft.description: Defines the range of last Polyphonic Aftertouch message required for the region to play. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv1 hirand.description: The region will play if the random number is equal to or higher than lorand, and lower than hirand. Type: float | Range: 0 to 1

SFZv1 hivel.description: If a note with velocity value equal to or higher than lovel AND equal to or lower than hivel is played, the region will play. Type: integer | Range: 1 to 127

SFZv1 key.description: Equivalent to using lokey, hikey and pitch_keycenter and setting them all to the same note value. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv1 lobend.description: Defines the range of the last Pitch Bend message required for the region to play. Type: integer | Range: -8192 to 8192

SFZv1 lobpm.description: Host tempo value. Type: float | Range: 0 to 500 bpm

SFZv1 loccN.description: Defines the range of the last MIDI controller N required for the region to play. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv1 lochan.description: If incoming notes have a MIDI channel between lochan and hichan, the region will play. Type: integer | Range: 1 to 16

SFZv1 lochanaft.description: Defines the range of last Channel Aftertouch message required for the region to play. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv1 lokey.description: Determine the low boundary of a certain region. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv1 loop_end.description: The loop end point, in samples. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 4294967296 sample units

SFZv1 loop_mode.description: Allows playing samples with loops defined in the unlooped mode. Type: string | Options: loop_continuous, loop_sustain, no_loop, one_shot

SFZv1 loop_start.description: The loop start point, in samples. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 4294967296 sample units

SFZv1 loopend.description: loop_end alias. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 4294967296 sample units

SFZv1 loopmode.body: loopmode=no_loop for samples without a loop defined, loop_continuous for samples with defined loop(s).$0
SFZv1 loopmode.description: loop_mode alias. Type: string | Range: no_loop, one_shot, loop_continuous, loop_sustain

SFZv1 loopstart.description: loop_start alias. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 4294967296 sample units

SFZv1 lopolyaft.description: Defines the range of last Polyphonic Aftertouch message required for the region to play. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv1 lorand.description: The region will play if the random number is equal to or higher than lorand, and lower than hirand. Type: float | Range: 0 to 1

SFZv1 lovel.description: If a note with velocity value equal to or higher than lovel AND equal to or lower than hivel is played, the region will play. Type: integer | Range: 1 to 127

SFZv1 off_by.description: Region off group. Type: integer | Range: -2147483648 to 2147483647

SFZv1 off_mode.description: Region off mode. Type: string | Range: fast, normal, time

SFZv1 offby.description: off_by alias. Type: integer | Range: -2147483648 to 2147483647

SFZv1 offset_ccN.description: The offset used to play the sample according to last position of MIDI continuous controller N. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 4294967296 sample units

SFZv1 offset_random.description: Random offset added to the region offset. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 4294967296 sample units

SFZv1 offset.description: The offset used to play the sample. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 4294967296 sample units

SFZv1 on_hiccN.description: If a MIDI control message with a value between on_loccN and on_hiccN is received, the region will play. Default value is -1, it means unassigned. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv1 on_loccN.description: If a MIDI control message with a value between on_loccN and on_hiccN is received, the region will play. Default value is -1, it means unassigned. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv1 output.description: The stereo output number for this region. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 1024

SFZv1 pan.description: The panoramic position for the region. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100 %

SFZv1 pitch_keycenter.description: Root key for the sample. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv1 pitch_keytrack.description: Within the region, this value defines how much the pitch changes with every note. Type: integer | Range: -1200 to 1200

SFZv1 pitch_random.description: Random tuning for the region, in cents. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 9600 cents

SFZv1 pitch_veltrack.description: Pitch velocity tracking, represents how much the pitch changes with incoming note velocity, in cents. Type: integer | Range: -9600 to 9600 cents

SFZv1 pitcheg_attack.description: EG attack time. Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 pitcheg_decay.description: EG decay time. Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 pitcheg_delay.description: EG delay time. Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 pitcheg_depth.description: Envelope depth. Type: integer | Range: -12000 to 12000 cents

SFZv1 pitcheg_hold.description: EG hold time. Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 pitcheg_release.description: EG release time (after note release). Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 pitcheg_start.description: Envelope start level, in percentage. Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 %

SFZv1 pitcheg_sustain.description: EG sustain level, in percentage. Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 %

SFZv1 pitcheg_vel2attack.description: Velocity effect on EG attack time. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 pitcheg_vel2decay.description: Velocity effect on EG decay time. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 pitcheg_vel2delay.description: Velocity effect on EG delay time. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 pitcheg_vel2depth.description: Velocity effect on EG depth, in cents for pitch or filter cutoff. Type: integer | Range: -12000 to 12000 cents

SFZv1 pitcheg_vel2hold.description: Velocity effect on EG hold time. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 pitcheg_vel2release.description: Velocity effect on EG release time. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 pitcheg_vel2sustain.description: Velocity effect on EG sustain level, in percentage. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100 %

SFZv1 pitchlfo_delay.description: The time before the LFO starts oscillating. Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 pitchlfo_depth.description: LFO depth. Type: float | Range: -1200 to 1200 cents

SFZv1 pitchlfo_depthchanaft.description: LFO depth when channel aftertouch MIDI messages are received. Type: float | Range: -1200 to 1200 cents

SFZv1 pitchlfo_depthpolyaft.description: LFO depth when polyphonic aftertouch MIDI messages are received. Type: float | Range: -1200 to 1200 cents

SFZv1 pitchlfo_fade.description: LFO fade-in effect time. Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 seconds

SFZv1 pitchlfo_freq.description: LFO frequency, in hertz. Type: float | Range: 0 to 20 Hz

SFZv1 pitchlfo_freqchanaft.description: LFO frequency change when channel aftertouch MIDI messages are received, in Hertz. Type: float | Range: -200 to 200 Hz

SFZv1 pitchlfo_freqpolyaft.description: LFO frequency change when polyphonic aftertouch MIDI messages are received, in Hertz. Type: float | Range: -200 to 200 Hz

SFZv1 position.description: Only operational for stereo samples, position defines the position in the stereo field of a stereo signal, after channel mixing as defined in the width opcode. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100 %

SFZv1 resonance.description: The filter cutoff resonance value, in decibels. Type: float | Range: 0 to 40 dB

SFZv1 rt_decay.description: Applies only to regions that triggered through trigger=release. The volume decrease (in decibels) per seconds after the note has been attacked. Type: float | Range: 0 to 200 dB

SFZv1 sample.description: Defines which sample file the region will play. Type: string

SFZv1 seq_length.description: Sequence length, used together with seq_position to use samples as round robins. Type: integer | Range: 1 to 100

SFZv1 seq_position.description: Sequence position. The region will play if the internal sequence counter is equal to seq_position. Type: integer | Range: 1 to 100

SFZv1 sw_down.description: Enables the region to play if the key equal to sw_down value is depressed. Key has to be in the range specified by sw_lokey and sw_hikey. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv1 sw_hikey.description: Defines the range of the keyboard to be used as trigger selectors for the sw_last opcode. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv1 sw_last.description: Enables the region to play if the last key pressed in the range specified by sw_lokey and sw_hikey is equal to the sw_last value. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv1 sw_lokey.description: Defines the range of the keyboard to be used as trigger selectors for the sw_last opcode. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv1 sw_previous.description: Previous note value. The region will play if last note-on message was equal to sw_previous value. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv1 sw_up.description: Enables the region to play if the key equal to sw_up value is not depressed. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv1 sw_vel.description: Allows overriding the velocity for the region with the velocity of the previous note. Type: string | Range: current, previous

SFZv1 sync_beats.description: Region playing synchronization to host position. Type: float | Range: 0 to 32 beats

SFZv1 sync_offset.description: Region playing synchronization to host position offset. Type: float | Range: 0 to 32 beats

SFZv1 transpose.description: The transposition value for this region which will be applied to the sample. Type: integer | Range: -127 to 127

SFZv1 trigger.description: Sets the trigger which will be used for the sample to play. Type: string | Range: attack, release, first, legato, release_key

SFZv1 tune.description: The fine tuning for the sample, in cents. Type: integer | Range: -100 to 100 cents

SFZv1 volume.description: The volume for the region, in decibels. Type: float | Range: -144 to 6 dB

SFZv1 width.description: Only operational for stereo samples, width defines the amount of channel mixing applied to play the sample. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100 %

SFZv1 xf_cccurve.description: MIDI controllers crossfade curve for the region. Type: string | Range: gain, power

SFZv1 xf_keycurve.description: Keyboard crossfade curve for the region. Type: string | Range: gain, power

SFZv1 xf_velcurve.description: Velocity crossfade curve for the region. Type: string | Range: gain, power

SFZv1 xfin_hiccN.description: Fade in control based on MIDI CC. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv1 xfin_hikey.description: Fade in control based on MIDI note (keyboard position). Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv1 xfin_hivel.description: Fade in control based on velocity. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv1 xfin_loccN.description: Fade in control based on MIDI CC. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv1 xfin_lokey.description: Fade in control based on MIDI note (keyboard position). Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv1 xfin_lovel.description: Fade in control based on velocity. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv1 xfout_hiccN.description: Fade out control based on MIDI CC. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv1 xfout_hikey.description: Fade out control based on MIDI note number (keyboard position). Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv1 xfout_hivel.description: Fade out control, based on velocity. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv1 xfout_loccN.description: Fade out control based on MIDI CC. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv1 xfout_lokey.description: Fade out control based on MIDI note number (keyboard position). Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv2 ampeg_attack_onccN.description: ampeg_attackccN alias. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100 seconds

SFZv2 ampeg_decay_onccN.description: ampeg_decayccN alias. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100

SFZv2 ampeg_delay_onccN.description: ampeg_delayccN alias. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100

SFZv2 ampeg_hold_onccN.description: ampeg_holdccN alias. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100

SFZv2 ampeg_release_onccN.description: ampeg_releaseccN alias. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100 seconds

SFZv2 ampeg_start_onccN.description: ampeg_startccN alias. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100 seconds

SFZv2 ampeg_sustain_onccN.description: ampeg_sustainccN alias. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100 %

SFZv2 amplfo_depth_onccN.description: amplfo_depthccN alias. Type: float | Range: -10 to 10 dB

SFZv2 bend_smooth.description: Pitch bend smoothness. Adds 'inertia' to pitch bends, so fast movements of the pitch bend wheel will have a delayed effect on the pitch change. Type: float

SFZv2 bend_stepdown.description: Pitch bend step, in cents, for downward pitch bends. Type: integer | Range: 1 to 1200 cents

SFZv2 bend_stepup.description: Pitch bend step, in cents, applied to upwards bends only. Type: integer | Range: 1 to 1200 cents

SFZv2 bus.description: The target bus for the effect. Type: string | Range: main, aux1, aux2, aux3, aux4, aux5, aux6, aux7, aux8, fx1, fx2, fx3, fx4, midi

SFZv2 cutoff_onccN.description: cutoff_ccN alias. Type: integer | Range: -9600 to 9600 cents

SFZv2 cutoff_random.description: fil_random alias. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 9600 cents

SFZv2 cutoff2.description: cutoff alias. Type: float | Range: 0 to SampleRate / 2 Hz

SFZv2 #define.description: Creates a variable and gives it a value. Type: string

SFZv2 delay_beats.description: Delays the start of the region until a certain amount of musical beats are passed. Type: float

SFZv2 delay_onccN.description: delay_ccN alias. Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 seconds

SFZv2 delay_samples.description: Allows the region playback to be postponed for the specified time, measured in samples (and therefore dependent on current sample rate). Type: integer

SFZv2 direction.description: The direction in which the sample is to be played. Type: string | Range: forward, reverse

SFZv2 effect3.description: Gain of the region's send into the 3rd effect bus. Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 %

SFZv2 effect4.description: Gain of the region's send into the 4th effect bus. Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 %

SFZv2 egN_curveX.description: Instructs the player to use a curve shape defined under a curve header for the specified envelope segment.

SFZv2 egN_levelX.description: Sets the envelope level at a specific point in envelope number N. Type: float | Range: -1 to 1

SFZv2 eqN_bw_onccX.description: eqN_bwccX alias. Type: float | Range: -4 to 4 octaves

SFZv2 eqN_freq_onccX.description: eqN_freqccX alias. Type: float | Range: -30000 to 30000 Hz

SFZv2 eqN_gain_onccX.description: eqN_gainccX alias. Type: float | Range: -96 to 24 dB

SFZv2 eqN_type.description: Sets the type of EQ filter. Type: string | Range: peak, lshelf, hshelf

SFZv2 fil2_keycenter.description: fil_keycenter alias. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv2 fil2_keytrack.description: fil_keytrack alias. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 1200 cents

SFZv2 fil2_type.description: fil_type alias. Type: string | Range: lpf_1p, hpf_1p, lpf_2p, hpf_2p, bpf_2p, brf_2p, bpf_1p, brf_1p, apf_1p, lpf_2p_sv, hpf_2p_sv, bpf_2p_sv, brf_2p_sv, pkf_2p, lpf_4p, hpf_4p, lpf_6p, hpf_6p, comb, pink, lsh, hsh, peq

SFZv2 fil2_veltrack.description: fil_veltrack alias. Type: integer | Range: -9600 to 9600 cents

SFZv2 fillfo_depth_onccN.description: fillfo_depthccN alias. Type: float | Range: -1200 to 1200 cents

SFZv2 gain_onccN.description: gain_ccN alias. Type: float | Range: -144 to 48 dB

SFZv2 hiprog.description: The region plays when the MIDI program number is between loprog and hiprog. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv2 hitimer.description: Region plays if timer is between lotimer and hitimer. Type: float

SFZv2 lfoN_count.description: Number of LFO repetitions for LFO N before the LFO stops. Type: integer

SFZv2 lfoN_delay.description: Onset delay for LFO number N. Type: float

SFZv2 lfoN_fade.description: Fade-in time for LFO number N. Type: float

SFZv2 lfoN_freq.description: The base frequency of LFO number N, in Hertz. Type: float

SFZv2 lfoN_phase.description: Initial phase shift for LFO number N. Type: float | Range: 0 to 1

SFZv2 lfoN_steps.description: Number of steps in LFO step sequencer. Type: integer

SFZv2 lfoN_stepX.description: Level of the step number X in LFO step sequencer. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100 percent

SFZv2 loop_count.description: The number of times a loop will repeat. Type: integer

SFZv2 loop_type.description: Defines the looping mode. Type: string | Range: forward, backward, alternate

SFZv2 loprog.description: The region plays when the MIDI program number is between loprog and hiprog. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv2 lotimer.description: Region plays if timer is between lotimer and hitimer. Type: float

SFZv2 md5.description: Calculates the MD5 digital fingerprint hash of a sample file, represented as a sequence of 32 hexadecimal digits. Type: string

SFZv2 note_offset.description: Tells SFZ to shift all incoming MIDI data by the specified number of notes. Type: integer

SFZv2 note_polyphony.description: Polyphony limit for playing the same note repeatedly. Type: integer

SFZv2 note_selfmask.description: Controls note-stealing behavior for a single pitch, when using note_polyphony. Type: string | Range: on, off

SFZv2 octave_offset.description: Shifts all incoming MIDI data by the specified octave. Type: integer

SFZv2 offset_onccN.description: offset_ccN alias. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 4294967296 sample units

SFZv2 pan_keycenter.description: Center key for pan keyboard tracking. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv2 pan_keytrack.description: The amount by which the panning of a note is shifted with each key. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100 %

SFZv2 pan_veltrack.description: The effect of note velocity on panning. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100 %

SFZv2 phase.description: If invert is set, the region is played with inverted phase. Type: string | Range: normal, invert

SFZv2 pitchlfo_depth_onccN.description: pitchlfo_depthccN alias. Type: float | Range: -1200 to 1200 cents

SFZv2 resonance_ccN.description: resonance_onccN alias. Type: float | Range: 0 to 40 dB

SFZv2 resonance2_ccN.description: resonance2_onccN alias. Type: float | Range: 0 to 40 dB

SFZv2 resonance2.description: resonance alias. Type: float | Range: 0 to 40 dB

SFZv2 reverse_hiccN.description: If MIDI CC N is between reverse_loccN and reverse_hiccN, the region plays reversed. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv2 reverse_loccN.description: If MIDI CC N is between reverse_loccN and reverse_hiccN, the region plays reversed. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv2 rt_dead.description: Controls whether a release sample should play if its sustain sample has ended, or not. Type: string | Range: on, off

SFZv2 set_ccN.description: Sets a default initial value for MIDI CC number N, when the instrument is initially loaded. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv2 sostenuto_sw.description: Turns the sostenuto switch on or off. Type: string | Range: on, off

SFZv2 start_hiccN.description: on_hiccN alias. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv2 start_loccN.description: on_loccN alias. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv2 stop_beats.description: Stops a region after a certain amount of beats have played. Type: float

SFZv2 stop_hiccN.description: If a MIDI control message with a value between stop_loccN and stop_hiccN is received, the region will stop playing. Default value is -1, it means unassigned. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv2 stop_loccN.description: If a MIDI control message with a value between stop_loccN and stop_hiccN is received, the region will stop playing. Default value is -1, it means unassigned. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv2 sustain_sw.description: Turns the sustain switch on or off. Type: string | Range: on, off

SFZv2 sw_default.description: Define keyswitch 'power on default' so that you hear something when a patch loads. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

SFZv2 type.description: Effect type or vendor-specific effect name. Varies across SFZ players. Type: string | Range: apan, comp, delay, disto, eq, filter, fverb, gate, limiter, lofi, mverb, phaser, static, strings, tdfir, com.mda.Limiter, com.mda.Overdrive, com.mda.Leslie, com.mda.RingMod, com.mda.Delay, com.mda.Bandisto, com.mda.Ambience, com.mda.DubDelay, com.mda.Detune, com.mda.Dither, com.mda.Combo, com.mda.Degrade, com.mda.SubSynth, com.mda.RezFilter

SFZv2 volume_onccN.description: gain_ccN alias. Type: float | Range: -144 to 48 dB

SFZv2 waveguide.description: Enables waveguide synthesis for the region. Type: string | Range: on, off

ARIA ampeg_attack_shape.description: Specifies the curvature of attack stage of the envelope. Type: float

ARIA ampeg_decay_shape.description: Specifies the curvature of decay stage of the envelope. Type: float

ARIA ampeg_decay_zero.description: Specifies how decay time is calculated. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 1

ARIA ampeg_dynamic.description: Specifies when envelope durations are recalculated. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 1

ARIA ampeg_release_shape.description: Specifies the curvature of release stage of the envelope. Type: float

ARIA ampeg_release_zero.description: Specifies how release time is calculated. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 1

ARIA amplitude_ccN.description: amplitude_onccN alias. Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 %

ARIA amplitude.description: Amplitude for the specified region in percentage of full amplitude. Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 %

ARIA curve_index.description: Curve ID definition. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 255

ARIA cutoff2_random.description: fil_random alias. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 9600 cents

ARIA delay_beats_random.description: Delays the start of the region after a random amount of musical beats. Type: float

ARIA eqN_dynamic.description: Specifies when EQ is recalculated. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 1

ARIA fil_gain.description: Gain for lsh, hsh and peq filter types. Type: float

ARIA fileg_attack_shape.description: Specifies the curvature of attack stage of the envelope. Type: float

ARIA fileg_attackccN.description: fileg_attack_onccN alias. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100 seconds

ARIA fileg_decay_shape.description: Specifies the curvature of decay stage of the envelope. Type: float

ARIA fileg_decay_zero.description: Specifies how decay time is calculated. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 1

ARIA fileg_decayccN.description: fileg_decay_onccN alias. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100

ARIA fileg_delayccN.description: fileg_delay_onccN alias. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100

ARIA fileg_depthccN.description: fileg_depth_onccN alias. Type: integer | Range: -12000 to 12000 cents

ARIA fileg_dynamic.description: Specifies when envelope durations are recalculated. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 1

ARIA fileg_holdccN.description: fileg_hold_onccN alias. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100

ARIA fileg_release_shape.description: Specifies the curvature of release stage of the envelope. Type: float

ARIA fileg_release_zero.description: Specifies how release time is calculated. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 1

ARIA fileg_releaseccN.description: fileg_release_onccN alias. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100 seconds

ARIA fileg_startccN.description: fileg_start_onccN alias. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100 seconds

ARIA fileg_sustainccN.description: fileg_sustain_onccN alias. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100 seconds

ARIA global_amplitude.description: ARIA extension, like amplitude, but affecting everything when set under the global header. Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 %

ARIA global_label.description: An ARIA extension which sets what is displayed in the default info tab of Sforzando. Type: string

ARIA global_tune.description: ARIA extension, like tune, but affecting everything when set under the global header. Type: integer | Range: -100 to 100 cents

ARIA global_volume.description: ARIA extension, like volume, but affecting everything when set under the global header. Type: float | Range: -144 to 6 dB

ARIA group_amplitude.description: ARIA extension, like amplitude, but affecting everything when set under the group header. Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 %

ARIA group_label.description: An ARIA extension which sets what is displayed in the default info tab of Sforzando. Type: string

ARIA group_tune.description: ARIA extension, like tune, but affecting everything when set under the group header. Type: integer | Range: -100 to 100 cents

ARIA group_volume.description: ARIA extension, like volume, but affecting everything when set under the group header. Type: float | Range: -144 to 6 dB

ARIA hihdccN.description: Like hiccN but with floating point MIDI CCs Type: float | Range: 0 to 1

ARIA hint_*.description: Its a 'hint' to the ARIA engine, others implementations don't have to follow.

ARIA #include.description: A special directive, which allows using SFZ files as building blocks for creating larger, more complex SFZ files. Type: string

ARIA label_ccN.description: Creates a label for the MIDI CC. Type: string

ARIA lfoN_offset.description: DC offset - Add to LFO output; not affected by scale. Type: float

ARIA lfoN_ratio.description: Sets the ratio between the specified sub waveform and the main waveform. Type: float

ARIA lfoN_scale.description: Sets the scaling between the specified sub waveform and the main waveform. Type: float

ARIA lohdccN.description: Like loccN but with floating point MIDI CCs Type: float | Range: 0 to 1

ARIA looptype.description: loop_type alias. Type: string | Range: forward, backward, alternate

ARIA master_amplitude.description: ARIA extension, like amplitude, but affecting everything when set under the master header. Type: float | Range: 0 to 100 %

ARIA master_label.description: An ARIA extension which sets what is displayed in the default info tab of Sforzando. Type: string

ARIA master_tune.description: ARIA extension, like tune, but affecting everything when set under the master header. Type: integer | Range: -100 to 100 cents

ARIA master_volume.description: ARIA extension, like volume, but affecting everything when set under the master header. Type: float | Range: -144 to 6 dB

ARIA off_curve.description: When off_mode is set to time, this specifies the math to be used to fade out the regions being muted by voice-stealing. Type: integer | Range: -2 to 10

ARIA off_shape.description: The coefficient used by off_curve. Type: float

ARIA off_time.description: When off_mode is set to time, this specifies the fadeout time for regions being muted by voice-stealing. Type: float

ARIA on_hihdccN.description: Like on_hiccN but with floating point MIDI CCs. Type: float | Range: 0 to 1

ARIA on_lohdccN.description: Like on_loccN but with floating point MIDI CCs. Type: float | Range: 0 to 1

ARIA pan_law.description: Sets the pan law to be used. Type: string | Range: mma, balance

ARIA pan_random.description: Random panoramic position for the region. Type: float | Range: -100 to 100 %

ARIA param_offset.description: Adds a number to the parameter numbers of built-in or vendor-specific effects. Type: integer

ARIA pitch.description: tune alias. Type: integer | Range: -100 to 100 cents

ARIA pitcheg_attack_shape.description: Specifies the curvature of attack stage of the envelope. Type: float

ARIA pitcheg_decay_shape.description: Specifies the curvature of decay stage of the envelope. Type: float

ARIA pitcheg_decay_zero.description: Specifies how decay time is calculated. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 1

ARIA pitcheg_depthccN.description: pitcheg_depth_onccN alias. Type: integer | Range: -12000 to 12000 cents

ARIA pitcheg_dynamic.description: Specifies when envelope durations are recalculated. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 1

ARIA pitcheg_release_shape.description: Specifies the curvature of release stage of the envelope. Type: float

ARIA pitcheg_release_zero.description: Specifies how release time is calculated. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 1

ARIA polyphony_group.description: group alias. Type: integer | Range: -2147483648 to 2147483647

ARIA region_label.description: An ARIA extension which sets what is displayed in the default info tab of Sforzando. Type: string

ARIA resonance_random.description: Filter cutoff resonance random value, in decibels. Type: float | Range: 0 to 40 dB

ARIA set_hdccN.description: Like set_ccN but with floating point MIDI CCs. Type: float | Range: 0 to 1

ARIA set_realccN.description: set_hdccN alias. Type: float | Range: 0 to 1

ARIA sostenuto_cc.description: Reassigns the sostenuto pedal CC to a non-standard value. Type: float | Range: 0 to 127

ARIA sostenuto_lo.description: Sets the minimum point at which the sostenuto pedal (MIDI CC 66) is considered 'down'. Type: float | Range: 0 to 127

ARIA start_hihdccN.description: on_hihdccN alias. Type: float | Range: 0 to 1

ARIA start_lohdccN.description: on_lohdccN alias. Type: float | Range: 0 to 1

ARIA stop_hihdccN.description: Like stop_hiccN but with floating point MIDI CCs. Type: float | Range: 0 to 1

ARIA stop_lohdccN.description: Like stop_loccN but with floating point MIDI CCs. Type: float | Range: 0 to 1

ARIA sustain_cc.description: Reassigns the sustain pedal CC to a non-standard value. Type: float | Range: 0 to 127

ARIA sustain_lo.description: Sets the minimum point at which the sustain pedal (MIDI CC 64) is considered 'down'. Type: float | Range: 0 to 127

ARIA sw_hilast.description: Like sw_last, but allowing a region to be triggered across a range of keyswitches. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

ARIA sw_label.description: Label for activated keyswitch on GUI. Type: string

ARIA sw_lolast.description: Like sw_last, but allowing a region to be triggered across a range of keyswitches. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 127

ARIA sw_note_offset.description: Follows the same logic as SFZ 2.0s note_offset but for key switches. Type: integer

ARIA sw_octave_offset.description: Follows the same logic as SFZ 2.0s octave_offset but for key switches. Type: integer

ARIA tune_ccN.description: pitch_onccN alias. Type:  | Range: -9600 to 9600 cents

ARIA tune_curveccN.description: pitch_curveccN alias. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 255

ARIA tune_keytrack.description: pitch_keytrack alias. Type: integer | Range: -1200 to 1200

ARIA tune_onccN.description: pitch_onccN alias. Type:  | Range: -9600 to 9600 cents

ARIA tune_random.description: pitch_random alias. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 9600 cents

ARIA tune_veltrack.description: pitch_veltrack alias. Type: integer | Range: -9600 to 9600 cents

ARIA varNN_*.description: Specifies the target for variable NN to modulate.

ARIA varNN_curveccX.description: Specifies the curve number which MIDI CC X uses to modulate variable NN. Type: integer | Range: 0 to 255

ARIA varNN_mod.description: Specifies the method used to calculate variable number NN from MIDI CCs. Type: string | Range: mult, add

ARIA varNN_onccX.description: Specifies the method used to calculate variable number NN from MIDI CCs. Type: float | Range: 0 to 1

ARIA vendor_specific.description: Defines vendor-specific effects, for example Garritan-specific stage depth effect in ARIA. Type: string

MIDI CC0.description: MIDI CC for bank select. Used to switch preset banks for patch selection in conjunction with program change commands.

MIDI CC6.description: MIDI CC for data entry MSB.

MIDI CC16.description: MIDI CC for general purpose controller 1.

MIDI CC17.description: MIDI CC for general purpose controller 2.

MIDI CC18.description: MIDI CC for general purpose controller 3.

MIDI CC19.description: MIDI CC for general purpose controller 4.

MIDI CC33.description: MIDI CC for modulation wheel fine adjustment.

MIDI CC34.description: MIDI CC for breath controller fine adjustment.

MIDI CC71.description: MIDI CC for sound timbre (typically filter resonance).

MIDI CC72.description: MIDI CC for sound control 3 (typically amp envelope release time).

MIDI CC73.description: MIDI CC for sound control 4 (typically amp envelope attack time).

MIDI CC74.description: MIDI CC for sound control 5 (typically filter frequency).

MIDI CC75.description: MIDI CC for sound control 6 (typically amp envelope decay time).

MIDI CC76.description: MIDI CC for sound control 7 (typically vibrato rate).

MIDI CC77.description: MIDI CC for sound control 8 (typically vibrato depth).

MIDI CC78.description: MIDI CC for sound control 9 (typically vibrato delay).

MIDI CC79.description: MIDI CC for sound control 10 (typically undefined).

MIDI CC80.description: MIDI CC for general purpose controller 5.

MIDI CC81.description: MIDI CC for general purpose controller 6.

MIDI CC82.description: MIDI CC for general purpose controller 7.

MIDI CC83.description: MIDI CC for general purpose controller 8.

MIDI CC88.description: MIDI CC for high resolution velocity prefix.

MIDI CC91.description: MIDI CC for effects 1 depth (typically reverb send level).

MIDI CC92.description: MIDI CC for Effects 2 Depth (formerly Tremolo Depth).

MIDI CC93.description: MIDI CC for Effects 3 Depth (typically chorus send level).

MIDI CC94.description: MIDI CC for Effects 4 Depth (formerly Celeste [Detune] Depth).

MIDI CC95.description: MIDI CC for Effects 5 Depth (formerly Phaser Depth).

MIDI CC96.description: MIDI CC for Data Increment (Data Entry +1).

MIDI CC97.description: MIDI CC for Data Decrement (Data Entry -1).

MIDI CC98.description: MIDI CC for Non-Registered Parameter Number LSB.

MIDI CC99.description: MIDI CC for Non-Registered Parameter Number MSB.

MIDI CC100.description: MIDI CC for Registered Parameter Number LSB.

MIDI CC101.description: MIDI CC for Registered Parameter Number MSB.

MIDI CC120.description: MIDI CC for all sound off.

MIDI CC121.description: MIDI CC for all controllers off.

MIDI CC122.description: MIDI CC for local control on/off.

MIDI CC123.description: MIDI CC for all notes off.

MIDI CC124.description: MIDI CC for omni mode off (plus all notes off).

MIDI CC125.description: MIDI CC for omni mode on (plus all notes off).

MIDI CC126.description: MIDI CC for Mono Mode On (+Poly Mode Off, +All Notes Off).

MIDI CC127.description: MIDI CC for Poly Mode On (+Mono Mode Off, +All Notes Off).

SFZv2 CC128.description: SFZ v2 CC for pitch bend.

SFZv2 CC129.description: SFZ v2 CC for Channel Aftertouch.

SFZv2 CC130.description: SFZ v2 CC for Polyphonic Aftertouch.

SFZv2 CC131.description: SFZ v2 CC for Note-on Velocity.

SFZv2 CC132.description: SFZ v2 CC for Note-off Velocity.

SFZv2 CC133.description: SFZ v2 CC for Note Number.

SFZv2 CC134.description: SFZ v2 CC for Note Gate. 0 = no notes pressed, 1 = >0 notes pressed.

SFZv2 CC135.description: SFZ v2 CC for Unipolar Random (yields values between 0 and 1).

SFZv2 CC136.description: SFZ v2 CC for Bipolar Random (yields values between -1 and 1).

SFZv2 CC137.description: SFZ v2 CC for Alternate (yields alternating values of 0 and 1 with each note-on event).

ARIA CC140.description: ARIA CC for relative key delta (yields the distance in notes from last note-on to new note-on).

ARIA CC141.description: ARIA CC for absolute key delta.

ARIA CC142.description: ARIA CC for host tempo expressed in Beats Per Minute.

ARIA CC143.description: ARIA CC for host transport status where 0 = stopped, 1 = playing in non-loop mode, 2 = playing in loop mode.

ARIA CC144.description: ARIA CC for host sample rate.

ARIA CC145.description: ARIA CC for time since the engine has been up.

ARIA CC146.description: ARIA CC for yielding the current time signature numerator.

ARIA CC147.description: ARIA CC for yielding the current time signature denominator.

ARIA CC148.description: ARIA CC for yielding the period elapsed since song start, expressed in PPQ (Pulses Per Quarter note).

ARIA CC149.description: ARIA CC for yielding the period elapsed since bar start, expressed in PPQ (Pulses Per Quarter note).

ARIA CC150.description: ARIA CC for yielding the time elapsed since instrument instantiation, expressed in seconds.

ARIA CC151.description: ARIA CC for yielding the time elapsed since the last note-on event, expressed in seconds.

ARIA CC152.description: ARIA CC for yielding the time elapsed since the last note-off event, expressed in seconds.

ARIA CC153.description: ARIA CC for yielding the cuurent number of keys held down.

ARIA CC154.description: ARIA CC for yielding the current number of active voices.

ARIA CC155.description: ARIA CC for yielding the playahead (offset) value of the sample triggered most recently in the instrument.
